src:
Gerindra soal PKS Minta Wagub: Sabar, Jangan Tambah Masalah Anies
03 Nov 2019, 08:32 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - PKS menilai hebohnya anggaran di Pemprov DKI Jakarta berkaitan dengan kosongnya posisi wakil gubernur. Gerindra menilai pengelolaan anggaran dan kosongnya wakil gubernur sama sekali tidak berkaitan.
"Pak Anies sudah ada masalah kok ditambahi masalah lagi. Persoalan wagub itu kan dalam pandangan saya kan sudah. Saya mengatakan ini proses politik dan penganggaran proses yang berbeda. Jangan ditambahi masalah Pak Anies, ya sabarlah. Bantu Pak Anies mengatasi kisruh polemik ini, Jangan ditambah lagi," kata Wakil Ketua DPD Gerindra DKI Jakarta Syarif kepada wartawan, Sabtu (2/10/2019) malam.
Syarif mengatakan setuju jika Anies perlu pendamping. Namun hal itu dinilai Syarif perlu menunggu usai proses pembahasan RAPBD 2020 selesai.
"Iya perlu pendamping, setuju. Cuma kan di dalam mendampingkan pak Anies kan proses politik. Sementara penganggaran proses teknokratis yang dimulai sejak bulan 3, bulan maret 2019. Lalu di RKPD, begitulah prosesnya," sebut Syarif.
Dia sendiri mengatakan pemilihan wagub akan selesai pada akhir tahun. Saat ini anggota DPRD DKI, menurut Syarif, masih berkonsetrasi pada pembahasan RAPBD.
"Saya sudah katakan akhir tahun ini insyallah bisa selesai. Cuman sekarang proses konsentrasi segera selasai pembahasan APBD. Sekarang seluruh anggota konsentrasi, dari pagi sampai malam nggak selsai juga pembahasan APBD, proses ini setelah diketok baru bicara wagub," tuturnya.
Sebelumnya, Fraksi PKS di DPRD DKI Jakarta mendorong adanya wakil gubernur untuk mendampingi Anies Baswedan di Pemprov. Sebab, F-PKS menganggap kekosongan kursi DKI-2 menjadi salah satu penyebab munculnya anggaran aneh dalam rencana anggaran 2020.

text:
Gerindra about PKS Asking Deputy Governor: Patience, Don't Add to Anies's Problem
03 Nov 2019, 08:32 by Muhammad Fida Ul Haq
Jakarta - PKS assessed the chaos of the budget in the DKI Jakarta Provincial Government related to the vacant position of the deputy governor. Gerindra assessed that the management of the budget and the vacant vice governor were completely unrelated.
"Mr. Anies already has a problem, why is it added again? The problem of the Deputy Governor is in my view, right? I say this is a different political process and budgeting process. Do not add up to the problem of Mr. Anies, yes be patient. Help Mr. Anies overcome this polemic chaos, Don't added, "said Deputy Chairman of DKI Jakarta Gerindra DPD Syarif told reporters on Saturday (2/10/2019) night.
Syarif said that he agreed if Anies needed a companion. But it was considered Syarif needs to wait after the 2020 RAPBD discussion process is complete.
"Yes, we need a companion, agreed. Only in accompanying Anies is the political process. While the budgeting of the technocratic process began on the 3rd month, March 2019. Then in the RKPD, that's the process," said Syarif.
He himself said the Deputy Governor election would be completed by the end of the year. At present, DKI DPRD members, according to Syarif, are still concentrating on the RAPBD discussion.
"I have already said that at the end of this year, God willing, it can be finished. But now the process of concentration will soon finish the APBD discussion. Now all members of the concentration, from morning to night, will also not finish the APBD discussion.
Previously, the PKS Faction in the DKI Jakarta DPRD encouraged the deputy governor to accompany Anies Baswedan in the Provincial Government. Because, F-PKS considers the vacancy of DKI-2 seats to be one of the causes of the emergence of a strange budget in the 2020 budget plan.
